GoalDesc: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
TargetDesc: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency
IndicatorDesc: Energy intensity measured in terms of primary energy and GDP
SeriesDesc: Energy intensity level of primary energy (megajoules per constant 2011 purchasing power parity GDP)
Units_Desc: Megajoules per USD constant 2011 PPP GDP
Source: Sources: World Bank analysis based on World Energy Statistics and Balances, IEA (2017); Energy Balances, UN Statistics Division (2017)
